description:
OR's Hemispheres styles are backcountry icons, and the Hemispheres II Jacket is better than ever.

Proven 3L Gore-Tex® protection, unparalleled stretch and a new athlete-driven design make the Hemispheres II Jacket the ultimate solution for backcountry skiing and snowboarding. Nothing else delivers the same combination of trusted weather protection and high-mobility comfort
name: Outdoor Research Hemispheres II Jacket - Mens
